turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a dark coffee dark, tall cup of coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like just whipped cream on a little on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a tall dark coffee with whipped cream and honey, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah 69 Okay, I will pick it up from 291 Broadway.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on 291 broadway.
